localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: A SaaS kit that might be the perfect starting point for your next React project. Save time and skip implementing features like authentication, payments, teams, and more so you can focus on building your SaaS.
blogPost.body: A SaaS kit that might be the perfect starting point for your next React project. Save time and skip implementing features like authentication, payments, teams, and more so you can focus on building your SaaS.
blogPost.title: Serverless SaaS - Building SaaS apps faster with React
blogPost.author: Jake Prins

localize.description: 一个SaaS套件，可能是你下一个React项目的完美起点。节省时间，跳过实施认证、支付、团队等功能，这样你就可以专注于构建你的SaaS。
一個SaaS套件，可能是你下一個React項目的完美起點。節省時間，跳過實施認證、支付、團隊等功能，這樣你就可以專注於構建你的SaaS。

previous.excerpt: Make Zoom meetings FUN! Kickoff your next one with Tricktionary, a 5-min creative stoke to engage your audience. Optimized for 4-14 players. *Today only* we are hosting a livestream marathon if you want to play with us. Link on landing page.
previous.title: Tricktionary - Creative icebreaker game for Zoom meetings

localize.description: 让Zoom会议充满乐趣 用Tricktionary为您的下一次会议揭开序幕，5分钟的创意刺激让您的听众参与其中。优化为4-14名玩家。*仅限今天*，如果你想和我们一起玩，我们将举办一场直播马拉松。链接在登陆页面。
讓Zoom會議充滿樂趣 用Tricktionary爲您的下一次會議揭開序幕，5分鐘的創意刺激讓您的聽衆參與其中。優化爲4-14名玩家。*僅限今天*，如果你想和我們一起玩，我們將舉辦一場直播馬拉松。鏈接在登陸頁面。

next.excerpt: Nerdy Image Downloader is a tool for downloading images in bulk/batches. Download images from Pinterest boards. This tool automatically scrolls for you to collect all images and downloads them into a zip folder.
next.title: Nerdy Image Downloader - Downloads images from Pinterest board to zip

localize.description: 呆萌图片下载器是一款批量/批次下载图片的工具。从Pinterest板块下载图片。这款工具可以自动滚动为你收集所有图片，并将它们下载到一个zip文件夹中。
localize.tagline: 从Pinterest板块下载图片到压缩包

localize.description: 呆萌圖片下載器是一款批量/批次下載圖片的工具。從Pinterest板塊下載圖片。這款工具可以自動滾動爲你收集所有圖片，並將它們下載到一個zip文件夾中。
localize.tagline: 從Pinterest板塊下載圖片到壓縮包
